roleset.name: be an equal to, match
roleset.note: PARALLEL-V NOTES: Hah! Take that, Mary! (from parallel.01-v)

example.name: normally active
example.text: But, analysts say, [Asian cooperation]-1 isn't likely *trace*-1 to parallel the European Common Market approach.

example.name: passive
example.text: [Mary's violent tendencies towards John]-1 are paralleled *trace*-1 by her feelings of intellectual inadequacy.
example.arg: by her feelings of intellectual inadequacy.
